title: Join4Join • Kumuha ng mabilis na mga myembro para sa Discord ng libre
no_history: Mukhang wala Kang history na ipapakita dito
description: Join4Join ay ang pinakamahusah na website para makakuha ng mga myembro para sa iyong discord server! Mag farm ng coins at bumili ng mga myembro.
join_discord: MAG JOIN SA DISCORD SERVER PARA MAKAKUHA NG KARAGDAGANG COINS
disclaimer: Copyright © 2021 All Rights Reserved by Join4Join. Not Affiliated with Discord.
footer_title: JOIN 4 JOIN BOT - THE BEST BOT TO GET A LOT OF MEMBERS!
footer_description: Get thousand of members and grow your server very fast with this j4j bot ! Finish now to advertise, bump, do partners to get members. This bot allow you to get members quickly. Farm servers to get a lot of coins and buy your members
footer_buy: BUY: buy an advertisement to get a lot of members.
footer_farm: FARM: farm some servers to get a lot of members.
footer_check: CHECK: check servers to know if you can leave them without losing coins.
select_server: SELECT A SERVER TO BUY AN ADVERTISEMENT
leave_refund: Refund for member leaving within 4 days.
member_order: Ilang myembro ang gusto mo bilhin? (1 myembro para sa 1 coin)
amount_of_members: I-enter ang dami ng myembro na gusto mo
ad_in_progress: Your advertisement is in progress please be patient! Progress: %progress%. %more% more members need to be invited before your advert is completed.
not_enough_coins: You don't have enough coins to purchase this many members!
bot_warning: WARNING: If the bot does not have Create Invite or Kick Members permissions in your server your advert will be deleted!
set_notifications: If you have notifications enabled you will receive a ping in Discord when your adverts finish.
farm_description: FARM SOME SERVERS TO GET COINS: (%rate% coins / server)
click_confirm: By clicking on a server you allow the bot to add you to the server.
server_warning: WARNING! If you leave a server before 4 days is up you will lose %loss% coins.
autofarm_description: Auto-farm will automatically join servers when new adverts are purchased and earn you coins. Activate or deactivate auto-farm with the button below.
no_servers: Looks like there are no more servers to farm at the moment! Come back later...
check_description: You can leave these servers without losing coins:
check_warning: By clicking on a server you allow the bot to remove you from the server. (If the bot's permissions/position allow that! If you don't get removed you will have to manually leave the server.)
no_leave: Looks like there are no servers you can leave at the moment! You can safely leave servers after 4 days.
